column1: Specifications: "Instantly transform any TV display into a managed digital signage device."
Supports media content playback up to 4K resolution
Presents multimedia playlists managed in UniFi Connect
Create dynamic digital signage content with UniFi Connect’s layout creator
HDMI CEC support to automatically control displays
PoE in or USB-C adapter power
Note. Does not support Protect camera streaming. Use Protect Viewport to view Protect camera feeds on an HDMI display."
"Dimensions": "Without mount: 90 x 52 x 31 mm (3.5 x 2.1 x 1.2\") With mount: 92.1 x 56.3 x 35.7 mm (3.6 x 2.1 x 1.4\")"
"Weight": "Without mount: 163 g (5.8 oz) With mount: 183 g (6.5 oz)"
"Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 40° C (32 to 104° F)"
"Management application": "UniFi Connect web: Version 1.6.6 and laterUniFi Connect iOS™ and Android™"
